title: NSW Charming Two-Bedroom Cottage Farm Escape near Bathurst with Breakfast Hamper & Sparkling Wine
description: Escape to the country and cast your mind away from the hustle and bustle of the city with a charming group escape at The Red Hill Nest - a quaint cottage perfectly set in the heart of the Central Tablelands on a working farm and less than 15 minutes from Bathurst. This two-bedroom country haven prides itself on inviting guests to switch off, recharge and soak up the stillness of the countryside while enjoying exclusive use of the garden. Settle into your home-away-from-home and make use of the fully equipped kitchen, indoor and outdoor dining areas, spacious shower and open living plan. Relax on the verandah with a steaming mug of coffee or a glass of wine or cosy up by the firepit.
offer_address: 167 Saint Anthonys Creek Road, Glanmire, New South Wales 2795, Australia

title: Charming NSW Cottage Escape near Bathurst for up to Four Guests
description:
Escape to the country and cast your mind away from the hustle and bustle of the city with a charming group escape at The Red Hill Nest - a stylish cottage perfectly set in the heart of the Central Tablelands and less than 15 minutes from Bathurst. This two-bedroom country haven prides itself on inviting guests to switch off, recharge and soak up the stillness of the countryside while enjoying exclusive use of the garden. Settle into your home-away-from-home and make use of the fully equipped kitchen, indoor and outdoor dining areas, spacious shower and an open living plan. Relax on the veranda with a steaming mug of coffee or a glass of wine, cosy up by the firepit or take a long walk around the working Murray Grey cattle property.

Spend your days unearthing the beauty of Bathurst and sample a tipple at Winburndale Winery or Bathurst Grange Distillery, meander through Mayfield Garden or Evans Crown Nature Reserve, and take in the impressive vistas from Mount Panorama.
offer_address: 167 Saint Anthonys Creek Road, Glanmire, New South Wales 2795, Australia

title: Charming NSW Cottage Escape near Bathurst on Working Cattle Farm
description: Escape to the country with a charming getaway at The Red Hill Nest, a stylish cottage in the heart of the Central Tablelands. Settle into your home-away-from-home by relaxing on the veranda with a glass of wine, cosying up by the firepit or with a picnic overlooking the Murray Grey cattle property. Spend your days collecting eggs from the chicken coop for a cottage-cooked breakfast, sampling a tipple at Winburndale Vineyard and Winery or Reckless Brewing Co., or exploring Mayfield Gardens.
offer_address: 167 Saint Anthonys Creek Road, Glanmire, New South Wales 2795, Australia
